Class AIAdaptationConfig.Builder

java.lang.Object
AI.api.AIAdaptationConfig.Builder
Enclosing class:
AIAdaptationConfig
public static class AIAdaptationConfig.Builder extends Object
Builder pattern for constructing AIAdaptationConfig instances.

Allows for fluent configuration of the many parameters required for AI agents, providing sensible defaults where appropriate.

Author:
Team 04
